content.raw: some fixes relatred to the lack of GPU in `ign_gui_fixes`. The Qt5 support for Windows will require of including a configure.bat file (like the one in Gazebo) inside the ign_gui repository. If we need to skip trusty, we need to add conditionals in DSL code not to generate them in the case of distro == trusty an ign_sw == ign_gui.
content.html: some fixes relatred to the lack of GPU in ign_gui_fixes. The Qt5 support for Windows will require of including a configure.bat file (like the one in Gazebo) inside the ign_gui repository. If we need to skip trusty, we need to add conditionals in DSL code not to generate them in the case of distro == trusty an ign_sw == ign_gui.
